title: I can't turn on Location History for my new Pixel 3a
content:
I can't turn on Location History for my new Pixel 3a. When I try, it takes me to "Activity Controls", and under "Devices on this account" it shows my old phone - now disabled - and above it my new phone, but only called "(this device)" and there is a box saying:

"There was a problem getting this setting. Please try again later."

I've tried signing out of all my other devices as recommended elsewhere - it didn't do any good. Google Maps is already set to "Allowed all the time" for Location, and Maps works fine otherwise. But without Location History being on, i can't share my location with anyone. It just says "Something went wrong. Please check your internet connection and try again."

What can I do?
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
